item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - GRACHI S1 - EP + Bonus Track in [ALAC] (Nickelodeon) [FLAC/ALAC 16Bit/44.1kHz]
item.description:
Grachi: Life is Wonderfully Magical is the first soundtrack out of 3 from the Nickelodeon TV series of the same title, only 4 songs were published for streaming but they’re not available anymore, i got them from Deezer years ago.

THE FOLDER CONTAINS:
[FLAC]
GRACHI (Theme Song/Spanish Version)
¿QUÉ SABES?
TÚ ERES PARA MÍ
TÚ Y YO

[ALAC]
HECHIZO DE AMOR - (A song about Grachi, the main character, specially made by a latin rock group “Adammo”, this song is featured on the full soundtrack which is only available on physical CD, but now they included it on the re-release of their album “Amber” as a bonus track & i got it from Apple Music )

I’ll try to post the full soundtrack of the season 1 in ALAC later, i am still wanting a copy of the CD in any lossless quality, if i make the ALAC post, it’s gonna be all taken from many Apple Music albums, not the original CD, so i am also needing the soundtrack of the season 2, and Isabella’s SNCN album which contains 4 tracks from Grachi’s season 3

DOWNLOAD, ENJOY!
Hidden Content:
You must reply before you can see the hidden data contained here.
